name: sabre-dav
description: SabreDAV is a WebDAV server framework in PHP for exposing files and calendars over HTTP. Itâ€™s used in many self-hosted apps like ownCloud and Nextcloud.
features: WebDAV server: Provides standards-compliant WebDAV protocol implementation for file access over HTTP.
CalDAV support: Enables calendar synchronization across devices using the CalDAV protocol.
CardDAV support: Manages contacts with CardDAV for seamless address book syncing.
Plugin architecture: Extend functionality with custom plugins for authentication, storage, and features.
Access control: Implements fine-grained permissions and authentication mechanisms for secure access.
Property storage: Supports custom WebDAV properties for metadata and extended attributes.
Locking mechanism: Prevents concurrent edit conflicts with WebDAV locking support.
PHP framework: Built as a reusable library for integrating WebDAV into existing PHP applications.
Standards compliance: Follows RFC specifications for WebDAV, CalDAV, and CardDAV protocols.
Event system: Hooks into server events for custom logging, validation, and processing.
Multi-backend storage: Supports various storage backends including filesystem, database, and custom adapters.
Quota management: Enforces storage limits and tracks usage per user or collection.
